titles.title: Review to Ensure High Quality Cost-Effective Training for Border Patrol Agents Act of 2005

To require the Comptroller General to conduct a review of the basic training provided by United States Customs and Border Protection to Border Patrol agents to ensure that this training is being conducted as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.
Review to Ensure High Quality Cost-Effective Training for Border Patrol Agents Act of 2005

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Review to Ensure High Quality Cost-Effective Training for Border Patrol Agents Act of 2005 - Requires the Comptroller General to review and report to Congress on the basic training provided by U.S. Customs and Border Protection to Border Patrol agents to ensure that this training is being conducted as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.
